title: [Question] Pes ec campus cse vs sjce mysore cse (E057)
content: I am more interested towards joining pes but i want to know the placement of sjce cse does anyone here have any connection with the students in that college... please let me know

only 63% had got placed from cse this year
It's median is 12 isn't this good if we neglect the placement percentage(the amount of students in cse is pretty big)
